Summary: White orb circle moving very fast in sky toward mountains.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There was one other sighting in Aurora on or around June 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were standing outside of our home facing east. I was telling him about the orbs I had seen earlier this morning at my work. I pointed to the cottonwood 'cotton' that has been flying in the sky and mentioned that I was not seeing cotton but white orbs. Just as I said that we both saw a white orb much higher up in the sky traveling from northeast to northwest. My husband estimates that the object was traveling about Mach 2 or 3 (he is an aviation enthusiast) and no sonic boom was detected.
